message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority!
You're getting greedy, I'll take a bigger share this time!
You're getting desperate, I'll meet you in the middle... this time
You're getting closer, but I'm still not giving up!
You're getting aggressive, I'll make a stronger move this time
You're getting desperate, I'll take the rest!
Last chance, let's end this, 50/50 is fair
